lines.text:
[Kristian is walking backwards and almost crashes with Walter's car]
Don't you have any eyes?
Not for you!
[glaces with a smile to Felicitas, she smiles back]

[notices the flirt between the two]
You almost create an accident and now you get rude.
Next time I am gonna apologize when you drive me to death.
'The black hand' has striked again!

[about Kristian and Felicitas who are caught in a trailer]
Those who love each other always have a guardian angel
Why? They love each other?
We are gonna see that in the next turn.
You have no idea of a car!
What? Me? No idea? I am driving for 30 years!
That might be, but obviously you take the tram

[At the reception, checking in Walter]
Name?
Pardon me? I am the fiancé of Miss Bercelius.
Rules are rules, who doesn't check in properly won't get a room.

[to Walter]
Don't make any trouble, Stinker.
Is this the first name?
What?
Well, Stinker.
Walter.
So it's Walter Stinker.
[writes down]
Ingenieur Walter Kartner.
Who's that stinker then?
